website_summaries.verdict: A neutral running shoe with plenty of cushioning made for regular training runs.
pros: The Ghost 10 features super comfortable cushioning and provides a nice combination of comfort and value
Though the shoe contains a fair amount of padding, it's not too bulky
It also has a great feel right out of the box
cons: The laces have a tendency to come undone

customer_reviews.title: Review from former Saucony user
customer_reviews.text: I was a long-time Saucony Omni user (5 years or so) and really liked those shoes. But I felt that they were too stiff when running on pavement. I had tried Brooks when I first started running so I figured I'd give them a try. These shoes are definitely better than the Saucony. The stitching on the shoes is better, the laces are better, the fit is infinitely better, and they are far more comfortable to run in. I've put about 40 miles on them so far and really love how they feel. I can't say enough about how well they perform.
customer_reviews.author: John E

customer_reviews.title: Great walking or standing shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe for walking or standing for long periods of time. I wear them for bass fishing as well so a great fishing shoe. This is my second pair.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Clark

customer_reviews.title: Great so far!
customer_reviews.text: Only ran with these twice so far..but definitely comfortable and just grest fit. I switched out the laces for some speed laces. Perfect! Ill likley buy a second pair of these just to keep till i wear out this pair. Ill update this review in a few months to see how they hold up.
customer_reviews.author: mj

customer_reviews.title: Great running shoes
customer_reviews.text: I generally do not buy clothing online. I always worry that the fit will be incorrect. The shoes were a perfect fit! The cushioning feels like you’re running on a cloud. I will definitely stock up on this particular line. Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Feel good. Very comfortable. Love the color, I don't really care for the oranges and blues and reds on today's shoes. This plain grey suits me perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Brennan

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. Look great, fit as expected, and good value. Wear well. Good color selection. Prompt delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Nana Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Saucony and Nike and we have never had this kind of bad experience. I thought it was a fluke with ...
customer_reviews.text: Upper fell apart after about 10 runs. Came apart all along the seam between the upper and the sole on both feet. This is the second pair of Brooks that my son wore through in a matter of weeks. The first paid during HS track (with that pair he had numerous large holes all over the cloth upper) the second during Cross Country conditioning. He has worn Asics, Adidas, Saucony and Nike and we have never had this kind of bad experience. I thought it was a fluke with the first pair, but now we know. Never buy Brooks.
customer_reviews.author: kate

customer_reviews.title: Amazon Prime two day shipping took FOUR days. One star on shipping.
customer_reviews.text: Brooks tennis shoes fit and look good. five star on the shoes.
customer_reviews.author: BDW

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes! So much better than Nike!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these shoes to replace my Nike's about a month ago. The Brooks fit better, are much higher quality, and cost less!
customer_reviews.author: Michael R Wanamaker

customer_reviews.title: It's like u are are walking on air
customer_reviews.text: The shoes feel awsome!! It's like u are are walking on air!!! I'm ready for concrete now!!
customer_reviews.author: John Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe but you may need .5 size larger
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe! I had to order a .5 size larger
customer_reviews.author: Mark A Kowieski

customer_reviews.title: A great pair of active shoes.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are extremely comfortable. They have a great combination of support and cushioning.
customer_reviews.author: Stewart Richter

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect Fit! Very comfortable, great impact protection and stability. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jzgtrguy

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Straight out of the box, was a comfortable "ride" for a 4 mile run!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Hoover

product_meta.title: Brooks Mens Ghost 10 Running Shoe Primer Grey/Metallic Charcoal/Ebony 10 D(M) US
product_meta.description: The men's Ghost 10 running shoe delivers the smoothest ride possible for neutral runners.
feature_bullets: SOFT CUSHIONING BioMoGo DNA midsole cushioning dynamically adapts to your stride, dispersing impact away from your body for just-right softness underfoot.
SMOOTH, STABLE RIDE The Segmented Crash Pad is designed to adapt to each foot fall, so no matter how your foot lands, you’ll enjoy the smoothest ride possible.
SOFT, SECURE FIT The newly engineered mesh upper practically disappears on foot, with strategically placed stretch and structure where you need it.
